name: talking_computer
title: Talking Computer
description: Make the computer speak to you and learn the basics of Python and sytax programming

steps.title: Trinket
steps.description: To create a talking computer we will be using Trinket

components.text: Trinket is an online Python editor
**On the previous screen** click 'Open Starter Python Project' to open a Trinket window
Has a Trinket window opened on the right?
On the left of the Trinket screen is the code editor
On the right is the Trinket screen is where your code output is shown
To save your work you need a Trinket account, **click the login button**
Enter your email address and password then **click Create Account**
Have you managed to create a Trinket account?
Now **click Remix** to make your own copy of the Trinket
Did you successfully remix the Trinket project?
